body:
It's been awhile since I've posted really anything productive on the forums or really done anything Avicus related for a freaking long  time. Thought I would pop in a say hi and do an AMA since I'm kinda bored at the moment too. 

oh, and it's been 4 years (in November) since Avicus opened so that's kinda cool.
